title: Understand this, LoL is the WoW of mobas. Nothing will surpass it, it can only kill itself over time
body:
Just as nothing ever surpassed WoW in the mmo genre, nothing will ever surpass LoL.

Just as the only way WoW will ever be dethroned is by killing itself over time, that is the only way LoL will ever be dethroned.

That is all.
